name: MQuiz
tag_list: math, kidsmath, education, apps, app, mathapps, mathapp, kidsapp, kidsapps, educationapps, mentalmath, mentalcalculation
description: Collection of mental math quiz apps
overview:
MQuiz Apps - a collection of Math Quiz apps for iPhone, iPad and iPod are specifically designed for improving elementary / primary school children’s mental math calculation skills.

â€¨All MQuiz apps feature bright, clear and easy to use interfaces, and various levels of difficulties.

The following MQuiz apps are currently available on the Apple App Store:

  • MQuiz Addition Subtraction http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/mquiz-addition-subtraction/id503141001
  • MQuiz Multiply Divide http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/mquiz-multiply-divide/id509781877
  • MQuiz Number Line http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/mquiz-number-line/id516515911
  • MQuiz Negative Numbers http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/mquiz-negative-numbers/id520811336
  • MQuiz Square Numbers http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/mquiz-square-numbers/id525408482
  • MQuiz Square Root http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/mquiz-square-root-mental-math/id531311457
  • MQuiz Skip Counting http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/mquiz-skip-counting-number/id543179108

The ultimate goal is to create MQuiz apps to cover all the basic mathematics field.
